title: Why Bears defense will regress, Raiders offense issues with Andy Benoit (Football 8/12)
description:
Nerd week begins as Will Brinson recaps the weekend news and then hops on the horn with Andy Benoit and Ryan Wilson to take a deep dive into the upcoming NFL season. The guys look at the Jets offense (16:00), Belichick without Tom Brady (19:15), why Derek Carr and his weapons don't mesh (22:15), what the Steelers offense and defense will look like (26:00), expectations for Lamar Jackson (20:30), why the Bears defense will regress (35:30), if Aaron Rodgers and Matt Lafleur can get along (38:30), if Gary Kubiak changes the Vikings (42:00), whether Bruce Arians can fix Jameis Winston (44:30) what to like about Norv Turner's offense (47:30) and much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
